verses.roman:
eka-kalasa sugandhi taila gauḍete kariyā
ihāṅ āniyāche bahu yatana kariyā"

synonyms: eka-kalasa—one big full jug; su-gandhi taila—scented oil; gauḍete kariyā—manufacturing in Bengal; ihāṅ—here; āniyāche—has brought; bahu yatana kariyā—with great care.
translation: "He prepared a large jug of it in Bengal, and with great care he has brought it here."
